name: Brewplus-ifdb
body:
### Welcome to BrewPlus IFDB Etition Pages.

BrewPlus-IFDB (BrewPlus - Il Forum Della Birra Edition) is an Italian FREE brewing software and an open source beer recipe creation tool developed in Java and compatible with Linux, Mac and Windows.
It is based on on Hobbybrew 2.0.3 and BrewPlus 1.5.0. 
It assists you to calculate color, bitterness, and other parameters for you while you add ingredients into the recipe. 
It includes BJCP 2015 style guidelines and a renewed tool for water and PH calculation.


### Download 

[Version 2.0.0 Final](https://github.com/rekhyt75/BrewPlus-IFDB/releases/download/2.0.1/BrewPlus-IFDB-2.0.1.zip)

### Authors and Contributors

**Contributors:** 

Michele "@rekhyt75" Antonecchia, 
Alessandro "@aperuzzi" Peruzzi,
Angelo "Girella" Cerella

**For Italian translation of BJCP, Malt list and Hop list: **

Giovanni "@mr-sgabuzen" Iovane,
Luciano "BATIGOLLE" Picchioni,
Massimo "superpiggy" Scalvini,
Vito "@vitofasano" Fasano  

**Special thanks to: **

Antonio De Feo & Stefano Longo

**At Honorem: **

We want to thanks all ones have been contributed to Hobbybrew 2.0.3 and BrewPlus 1.5.0, without of them this project it would not be existed.

### Support or Contact
